title: kjlimo
author: kjlimo
content: It's that time of year to talk about our plans for BPD 2023!Unfortunately, I haven't made any yet... but kicking around a couple options for Cleveland, Ohio, USA:Juice Lab, Brecksville, Ohio - 9am-11am... would love to teach someone how to pay using the lightning network... I say someone, cuz my guess is that I will be lucky if I get ONE person to attend, haha.I've had to switch from BlueWallet to Muun, and fees were never low on BlueWallet lightning wallet, and now they seem higher for the couple transactions I've done so far... not sure how much energy I have to set up my own node to save a quarter on transaction fees, but this is increasing the pressure... will it happen in 2023??? ... the years's almost half over... don't hold your breath.Hofbräuhaus in Cleveland, Ohio - 11am-1pm. There has been a monthly meetup here with successful turnout. I've only made it twice in the past 12 months, but I may piggy back off their event in meetup group to try a lunch crowd on a Monday.My 3 restaurants accepting lightning network is down to 2 (one closed), but I've added a barber who accepts the lightning network! We'll see if I get back to this in the fall after summer break with the kiddos.I hope to be back with my final Bitcoin Pizza Day 2023 plans, but in the meantime, others can share theirs!  Cheers!

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Wow, hope you are having plenty of visitors. Good luck with your pizza day event!There is an event in Tokyo as well. I went last year and it was a lot of fun, even though the pizza is expensive here.This year I can't go because we fly to Hong Kong on the 22nd. Maybe there we can find something.  Was looking in the forum if somebody would make a btc pizza contest this year. The pie making contest was such a big success, a few months back, I guess that would be a fun thing.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: As of now the plan is to see what promos places like bitrefill offer and get a GC and get some pizza for dinner.If not then menufi has some places close by that accept BTC through online ordering.This year seems to be a bit light on people posting / talking / tweeting about it.But there will be pizza, more then likely going to be a LN payment since fees are still up there.-Dave

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: I just searching how bitcoin pizza day happen - Pizza for bitcoins? - by laszlo Last active November 14, 2017.There are several restaurants pizza in my place that are very crowded with people. It's not a big company like Pizza Hut or Domino Pizza, but a Small and Medium Enterprise (MSMEs), one of my friends is building a pizza shop also, Lucky him, he is enough familiar with crypto so that case several times I saw him making custom pizzas with crypto design. I think I will suggest him to join us here.In my country, Pizza is not stapled food like rice, but quite interesting to eat because perfect with a combination of flavors, so liked by all people, like children, parents, and youngest. The price is quite cheap also when buy it on MSME shop, we can get a very small pizza for only $1 and we can buy 1/2 pizza also for $0.5, so many fans what else if we sell it in the school canteen.

comments.author: slurfius

Seriously if you want a pizza and you send me enough sats to cover your order I'll use my crypto.com card to have one delivered to you.If you would prefer to buy me a pizza (We're gluten free so I would want to pick the pizza and carryout location yes I'll even pick it up) I will send you a lightning payment

The last three contest was organized within this thread, and I hope this year it will remain within this thread. About other threads created in different boards, this is a historic event and people might want to share their excitement. Maybe they are not familiar with different boards so they end up creating topic without knowing that similar threads were created.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Today is historic for all people who love and believe in bitcoin. Every one that loves bitcoin deserves to mark this day with some sort of celebration, if not in  a big way, but in their own little way. Eating pizza is very appropriate for the day for those who can especially if they can pay with bitcoins. This day will always be remembered for the years to come and the value of the bitcoins will always be compared to the value of the present day each time. Bitcoin deserves to be celebrated.

comments.author: southerngentuk
comments.body: This is a big day in the history of bitcoin's existence for those who believe in and pursue it. People create this day as a celebration; it deserves it, and they also encourage and create joy and creative delight to celebrate it. Especially about a story related to pizza when in the old days people exchanged it with bitcoin, so to commemorate this story, they often eat and unleash their creativity on pizza with bitcoin. So let's enjoy your pizza together and have a great Bitcoin Pizza Day 2023.

comments.body: Quote from: southerngentuk on May 22, 2023, 07:02:29 PMThis is a big day in the history of bitcoin's existence for those who believe in and pursue it. People create this day as a celebration; it deserves it, and they also encourage and create joy and creative delight to celebrate it. Especially about a story related to pizza when in the old days people exchanged it with bitcoin, so to commemorate this story, they often eat and unleash their creativity on pizza with bitcoin. So let's enjoy your pizza together and have a great Bitcoin Pizza Day 2023.I remember it like it was yesterday, 13 years ago, 1 pizza for 10,000 BTC. In today's market, 1BTC for 10,000 pizza is regarded as excellent news. It's a memorable day for bitcoin, and I'm more delighted to see Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao dressed up for free pizza delivery. During its early years in the space, bitcoin was worth nothing and those who bagged it tended to exchange it with pizza, one of their unforgettable regrets, they swiped their chances of making multiple dollars away, at the blink of an eye. On the other hand, they are not to blame; we are all humans, and no one knows what the future contains, the possible outcome of bitcoin was underrated, no one believes it will be more valuable today.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: OP, I am really glad someone are actively engaging people to adopt Bitcoin and also the Lightning Network. I think the LN is key to the adoption of Bitcoin as a currency, but I think the learning curve for that, is still too high.  Will you be offering some discount for people who are paying with Bitcoin as an incentive for them to use Bitcoin as a currency? I find that a discount are one of the most effective strategies to increase Bitcoin adoption.
